chapters.title: Chapter 5: Questioners
chapters.info: Amico Nagoyin, p. 115 (94)—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah. She was stilled during capture after the taking of the Stone of Tear. She retains none of the cool self-possession that her co-captor Joiya possesses. She was the youngest of the Black sisters who left the Tower with Liandrin, barely old enough to wear the shawl.
